      This method checks if the game is finished
      Returns:
      true if the game is finished

    • startgame

      public void startgame()
      This method initialized the game. It make draw four Leader Cards to each player, that discards two; it extracts the first player and gives to all players the initial resources and faith points

    • givefinalpoints

      public void givefinalpoints()
      This method counts victory points of each player at the end of the game according to the rules

    • chooseInitialLeaderCards

      public boolean chooseInitialLeaderCards​(int i1, int i2)
      this method is used to make the player choose the starting LeaderActions
      Parameters:
      i1 - is the index of the first LeaderAction
      i2 - is the index of the first LeaderAction
      Returns:
      true if the command was successful

      Returns:
      true if the command was successful

    • extractionMarble

      public boolean extractionMarble​(char colrowextract, int numextract)
      This method translates the TakeMarbles message
      Parameters:
      colrowextract - indicates the row or the column to extract
      numextract - the column or row's number
      Returns:
      true if the extraction is right

    • manageMarble

      public boolean manageMarble​(char choice, int indexWarehouse, java.lang.String resourceWhiteMarble)
      This method permits to the client to add or to discard a caught marbles
      Parameters:
      choice - 0 if the client want to add the marble to Warehouse, 1 to Extra chest, 2 if he want to discard the marble
      indexWarehouse - row's index in which the client want to add the marble
      Returns:
      true if the add is right

    • exchangeWarehouse

      public boolean exchangeWarehouse​(int row1, int row2)
      This method permits to the client to change two rows of its Warehouse depot
      Parameters:
      row1 - the first row that player want change
      row2 - the second row that player want to change
      Returns:
      true if the client can do the change

    • selectDevCard

      public boolean selectDevCard​(java.lang.String ID, int column)
      this method called by the player allow to select from the DevCardDeck the card the player wants to buy
      Parameters:
      ID - of the dev card
      column - of the SlotDevCard
      Returns:
      true if there are no errors

    • payResourcesToBuyDevCard

      public boolean payResourcesToBuyDevCard​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> WarehouseRes, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> StrongboxRes, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> ExtrachestMap)

      Parameters:
      WarehouseRes - a map of the resources from the warehouse
      StrongboxRes - a map of the resources from the strongbox
      ExtrachestMap - a map of the resources from the extrachest

      Parameters:
      r1 - structure where first resource came from
      reqRes1 - first resource to pay
      r2 - structure where second resource came from
      reqRes2 - second resource to pay
      chosenResource - the resource wanted
      Returns:
      true if the resource to be payed are correct

      Returns:
      true if the payment is correct

    • activeDevCardProduction

      public boolean activeDevCardProduction​(int col)
      this method active a devcard production
      Parameters:
      col - the column where the card is stored, in according with the rules the card is always that one on the top
      Returns:
      true if the column is correct and the player has the resource to activate the card

    • payResourcesForDevCardProduction

      public boolean payResourcesForDevCardProduction​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> WarehouseRes, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> StrongboxRes, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> ExtrachestMap)
      this method is called when a player wants to activate a devcard production and has to pay for it
      Parameters:
      WarehouseRes - a map of the resources use for the payment that came from the warehouse
      StrongboxRes - a map of the resources use for the payment that came from the strongbox
      ExtrachestMap - a map of the resources use for the payment that came from the extrachest
      Returns:

    • endProduction

      public boolean endProduction()
      this method is called from the player to empty his buffer and doesn't allow any other production
      Returns:
      true is buffer is empty

    • updateLeaderCard

      public boolean updateLeaderCard​(java.lang.String ID, int choice)
      this method allow to change the status of leadercard
      Parameters:
      ID - leadercard's ID
      choice - 0 to discard 1 to activate
      Returns:
      true is the status change correctly

    • activeLeaderAction

      public boolean activeLeaderAction​(java.lang.String ID)
      this method called by the player allow to activate a leaderActionCard
      Parameters:
      ID - refer which card must to be activated, 0 for the first, 1 for the second
      Returns:
      true if the card is activated

    • discardLeaderAction

      public boolean discardLeaderAction​(java.lang.String ID)
      this method called by the player discard one of his leader action card to increase his faithmarker by one
      Parameters:
      ID - which leader action card must to be discarded: 0 for the first, 1 for the second
      Returns:
      true if the card is discarded

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn​(boolean onDisconnect)
      this is the last action a player can does, the turn ends and start the turn of another player if the game is online or Lorenzo's turn if the game is in singleplayer
      Parameters:
      onDisconnect - if player disconnects
